      • getPolicyChoices

        public static java.util.List getPolicyChoices(MessageContext context)
        Returns a List of ChoiceIdentifiers from the given MessageContext, if any.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        List of ChoiceIdentifiers, null if none present.
